summary: The module implements JupyterHub authenticators that integrate with Bitbucket’s OAuth service. It defines a core authenticator that performs the OAuth flow, exchanges tokens, fetches user profile and team data, enforces optional access restrictions, and updates the JupyterHub authentication state. An extended version also creates matching local system accounts for authenticated Bitbucket users.
business_intent: Allow JupyterHub deployments to rely on Bitbucket as a single sign‑on provider, enabling organization‑wide login, team‑based access control, and automatic provisioning of local user accounts for seamless notebook access.
